ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would say it is "Bacterial Molecular Biology". I would recommend it.

This course is a relatively intensive overview of the mechanisms involved in replication and recombination of bacterial DNA, as the mechanisms underlying transcription, translation and their regulation. I would recommend this course to any student who plans to work with microbes, because you learn a great deal of practical information.
The course would extremely helpful for someone who would like to improve his/her biochemistry and genetics of bacteria and/or for someone looking for a chance to improve paper-reading skills.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was necessary to round out my microbiology background.
